content: Guangmou's Spirit Power allows you to take his form and summon two snakes to the battlefield. These snakes will shoot poison projectiles at your foe, damaging them and inflicting them with poison. The equipped effect boosts your poison damage and poison resistance, which is extremely handy in places like the Webbed Hollow.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Guangmou_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Guangmou Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Guangmou Spirit'.
The content is as follows:
Guangmou's Spirit Power allows you to take his form and summon two snakes to the battlefield. These snakes will shoot poison projectiles at your foe, damaging them and inflicting them with poison. The equipped effect boosts your poison damage and poison resistance, which is extremely handy in places like the Webbed Hollow.
